summary: Steps-On-Spikes is more or less made to be a gift to someone. it's not much as of now other than a follower possibly with a few bugs but I hope to take it somewhere
descriptionHtml:
This mod was created for a friend, and Is uploaded here for convenience, feel free to use it if you like

Steps-On-Spikes is an Argonian Who decided to Leave the companions after being one of the few who Skjor offered the beast blood to, After turning his back on the Companions, he's been staying at the bannered mare, without a job or home, He's gotten so low on currency that he's needed to sell his Skyforged gear, These past few days he's just been waiting to get kicked out on the streets, hell, he needs food and drink so badly now he'd accompany some insane adventurer who kills deer for fun just so he could have a warm meal that night, maybe you can be that insane adventurer?

To install this mod you simply put everything in the root directory
author: SandFacts
